subject: Why method "assertEmpty(List errors)" in MultipleFailureException is "deprecation" ?
msgSnippet: Hi members, I am studying the JUnit source code. As my subject described , why this method is marked by deprecation ? I m very appreciate if someone can
messageBody:
Hi members,
I am studying the JUnit source code. As my subject described , why this method is marked by "deprecation" ?
I'm very appreciate if someone can explain it for me.
My JUnit version is 4.9.
Sincerely regards
Steven.
